subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ben Hansbrough scored 19 points, including a clinching layup with 19 seconds to play, as No. 15 Notre Dame defeated No. 2 Pittsburgh on Monday night.
snippet: Ben Hansbrough scored 19 points, including a clinching layup with 19 seconds to play, as No. 15 Notre Dame defeated No. 2 Pittsburgh on Monday night.
